title: On sybil-proof mechanisms
authors: Minghao Pan, Akaki Mamageishvili, Christoph Schlegel
abstract:
We show that in the single-parameter mechanism design environment, the only
non-wasteful, symmetric, incentive compatible and sybil-proof mechanism is a
second price auction with symmetric tie-breaking. Thus, if there is private
information, lotteries or other mechanisms that do not always allocate to a
highest-value bidder are not sybil-proof or not incentive compatible.
subjects: Computing Research Repository/Computer Science and Game Theory
